channel.title: Virtualized Aero Goodness
channel.description: On Tuesday, VMware announced the latest in their product lines, VMware Fusion 3 and Workstation 7. While I have been a fan of VMware Fusion on the Mac for a while â€“ this latest version is fantastic. As well...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ross Johnston+00:00
item.description:
Hi Martin, do you also do all your Visual Studio development on the Mac via Fusion? Any quirks with that? Is it still fast enough for development?
Thanks.
item.dc:creator: Ross Johnston

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description:
For day to day development in Visual Studio I have a big beefy Win 7 desktop with dual-monitors. I have used VS2010 Beta 2 in Fusion on my MacBook Pro, and even done demos on stage in that configuration - but it isn't what I use day to day.
Hope that helps,
Martin.
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward
